patthana21.20:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.20:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.20:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
